t=input()
for k in range(0,t):
    str=raw_input()
    ptr=1
    for i in range(0,len(str)):
        j=0
        for j in range(i+j,len(str)):
            tmp=str[i:j+1]
            #print tmp
            tmp=tmp[::-1]
            #print'rev= '+tmp
            if(tmp not in str):
                ptr=0
                break
        if(ptr==0):
            break
    if(ptr==1):
        print'YES'
    else:
        print'NO'
